testcase.name: Login Navia
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to Navia................................................passed When User Click login with client code......................................passed And User Enter Client Code..................................................passed And User Enter Password.....................................................passed And User Click Agree CheckBox...............................................passed And User Click Login button.................................................passed And User Click Otp Verification and enter manualy...........................passed And User Click Login Again..................................................passed

testcase.name: Add Any Script and Verify
testcase.system-out: When Navigate to home page..................................................passed And User click the search box...............................................passed And User Search any "WIPRO" Script..........................................passed And User Mouse Over and Add a Script "WIPRO"................................passed And User POP Up Message Appear Verify POP UP................................passed

testcase.name: User Placing the Order
testcase.system-out: When Navigate to home page..................................................passed And User mouse the scrip Selected "WIPRO"...................................passed And User Click the Buy scrip for Selected "WIPRO" Scrip.....................passed And User Click Market then Limit............................................passed And User Enter Amount in Price Text Box "4232"..............................passed And User Click Buy..........................................................passed And User Click Yes Popup....................................................passed Then Verify the Buy Scrip Notification Pop up...............................passed

testcase.name: Cancel the Scrip
testcase.system-out: When Navigate to home page..................................................passed And User Click Pending Order................................................passed And User Click Selected Scrip "WIPRO" Edit..................................passed And User Click Cancel.......................................................passed And User Click Yes for Confirmation.........................................passed Then User Verify the Cancellation Notification Popup........................passed

testcase.name: Payin add money in navia
testcase.system-out: When Navigate to home page..................................................passed And User Click Add Money....................................................passed And User enter money in amount to add.......................................passed And User Choose Pay Using UPI...............................................passed And User Enter UPI/ID/Mobile Number and click pay now.......................passed

testcase.name: Verify the Charts Changes in Different Minutes and Days
testcase.system-out: When Navigate to home page..................................................passed And User Click the Watch List...............................................passed And User Select scrip "S&P BSE SENSEX"......................................passed And User Click Watch List Again.............................................passed And User mouse over the scrip "Nifty 50"....................................passed And User Click the Charts...................................................passed And User Click the Candles Icon.............................................passed And User Choose Candle "candle".............................................passed And User Click the Mintues..................................................passed And User Choose One Minute..................................................passed And Verify One Minute Feed Connection Value and Wait One Minute Very Feed Connection Changes.passed And User Click the Five Minute..............................................passed And Verify Five Minute Feed Connection Valuebb..............................passed And User Click One Day......................................................passed And Verify One Day Feed Connection Value and Wait One Minute Very Feed Connection Changes.passed
